dict.string: Location is used to keep the app running during overnight HRV recordings. Your location data is not stored or transmitted.
Background location keeps the app running during overnight HRV recordings while your phone sleeps. Your location data is not stored or transmitted.
Flow Recovery needs Bluetooth to connect to your Polar H10 heart rate monitor for collecting heart rate variability data.
Flow Recovery reads your sleep data from HealthKit to correlate with overnight HRV measurements and provide better recovery insights.
Flow Recovery can optionally save HRV sessions to HealthKit for integration with other health apps.
